io.puremetrics.sdk

Class PureMetrics.Order.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.puremetrics.sdk.PureMetrics.Order.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PureMetrics.Order

    public static class PureMetrics.Order.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for PureMetrics.Order Object. Provides a convenient way to set the various fields of a PureMetrics.Order and generate associated payload which PureMetrics SDK can process

      • addProduct

        public PureMetrics.Order.Builder addProduct(java.lang.String productId,
                                            java.lang.String productCategory,
                                            long unitPrice,
                                            long discountedPrice,
                                            int units,
                                            java.lang.String currency)
        Add the product information which is being purchased
        Parameters:
        productId - The product Id
        productCategory - Category of the product which is being purchased
        unitPrice - Unit price for the product
        discountedPrice - Discounted Price for the product
        units - Number of units of the product being purchased
        currency - Optional field required when your transaction currency and product price currency is different
        Returns:
        PureMetrics.Order.Builder
